title: Ronaldo Vieira (footballer, born 1998)
summary:
Ronaldo Augusto Vieira Nan (Portuguese pronunciation: [ʁuˈnaldu viˈɐjɾɐ]; born 19 July 1998) is a professional footballer who plays for Italian Serie A side Torino on loan from Sampdoria, mainly operating as a central midfielder.
Born in Guinea-Bissau, and also holding Portuguese nationality, he is an England U21 international.
